files.Title: MB.Common.Aspects.LogAspect
files.Summary:
An aspect that logs method entry, exit, and exceptions using Serilog.
This aspect can be applied to methods to automatically log their execution lifecycle.

files.Title: MB.Common.Attributes.ErrorInformationAttribute
files.Summary:
An attribute used to annotate fields with additional error information.
This is useful for attaching meaningful error messages or metadata to enum fields or other constants.

files.Title: MB.Common.Attributes.GuidAttribute
files.Summary: Represents a custom attribute that can be applied to fields to associate them with a specific GUID.

files.Title: MB.Common.Attributes.RequiredSharedParametersAttribute
files.Summary: Represents an attribute to specify required shared parameters for a given target.

files.Title: MB.Common.Attributes.RevitCategoriesAttribute
files.Summary: Represents an attribute to associate a target with a set of Revit built-in categories.

files.Title: MB.Common.Attributes.SharedParameterTypeAttribute
files.Summary: Represents an attribute to specify the type of a shared parameter.

files.Title: MB.Common.Comparers.BoundingBoxComparer
files.Summary: A utility class for comparing and resolving bounding box coordinates from multiple points.

files.Title: MB.Common.Constants.FilePaths
files.Summary:
Contains static file paths and predefined constants used throughout the application.
Paths are based on the user's local application data folder.

files.Title: MB.Common.Constants.MbErrorMessages
files.Summary:
Contains predefined error message constants used throughout the application.
Helps maintain consistency and manageability of user-facing messages.

files.Title: MB.Common.Constants.MbfFiles
files.Summary: Provides constants and utility properties for MBF-related file paths.

files.Title: MB.Common.Constants.MbfGroups
files.Summary: Provides constant values for MBF parameter groups.

files.Title: MB.Common.Errors.Exceptions.MbException
files.Summary:
Represents a custom exception type used within the MicroBIM system.
Wraps an <xref href="MB.Common.Errors.Exceptions.MbException.MbError" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> and provides a description derived from it.

files.Title: MB.Common.Errors.MbError
files.Summary:
Defines a list of error codes used throughout the application.
Each enum value is annotated with <xref href="MB.Common.Attributes.ErrorInformationAttribute" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>
to provide a user-friendly error message.

files.Title: MB.Common.Errors.MbErrorExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for the <xref href="MB.Common.Errors.MbError" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> enumeration.

files.Title: MB.Common.Jsons.GenericJsonFileService
files.Summary: Provides generic methods for saving and loading JSON files from disk.

files.Title: MB.Common.Parameters.RevitParameterManager
files.Summary: Manages shared parameters in a Revit document, ensuring required parameters exist and are properly configured.

files.Title: MB.Common.Services.EmbeddedResourceService
files.Summary: Provides functionality for accessing and processing embedded resources in assemblies.

files.Title: MB.Common.Services.MailService
files.Summary:
Provides methods for sending emails, including support for attachments and both synchronous and asynchronous
operations.

files.Title: MB.Common.Settings.ListingSettings.FittingGroupHelper
files.Summary:
Provides helper methods for grouping <xref href="MB.Common.Settings.ListingSettings.StandardFittingType" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> values
into their corresponding PDF group names for listing and reporting purposes.

files.Title: MB.Common.Settings.ListingSettings.ListingConfig
files.Summary:
Represents the configuration for a listing, including elements, family details, category,
and fitting types. This class provides constructors to initialize its properties either
from a collection of elements or from a Data Transfer Object (DTO).

files.Title: MB.Common.Settings.ListingSettings.ListingDto
files.Summary:
Represents a data transfer object for a listing, including details such as family name, symbol name, category, and
selected fitting type.

files.Title: MB.Common.Settings.ListingSettings.ListingMapper
files.Summary: Provides methods for mapping between <xref href="MB.Common.Settings.ListingSettings.ListingConfig" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> and <xref href="MB.Common.Settings.ListingSettings.ListingDto" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> objects.

files.Title: MB.Common.Settings.ListingSettings.ListingSettingsHelper
files.Summary:
Provides helper methods for working with listing settings, including retrieval of <xref href="MB.Common.Settings.ListingSettings.ListingDto" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> objects
based on family and type information.

files.Title: MB.Common.Settings.ListingSettings.MicroBimListingRecommendationDto
files.Summary: Represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) used for providing recommendations specific to Micro BIM listings.

files.Title: MB.Common.Settings.ListingSettings.StandardFittingGroups
files.Summary: Provides predefined groupings of standard fitting types for different fitting categories.

files.Title: MB.Common.Settings.ListingSettings.StandardFittingType
files.Summary:
Represents a collection of fitting types commonly utilized within piping systems,
categorized by different connection methods such as threaded, grooved, embedded couplings,
integrated systems (IGS), flanged connections, and more.

files.Title: MB.Common.Settings.ListingSettings.ValueToStandardTypeDto
files.Summary: Represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) that associates a specific value with a standard fitting type.

files.Title: MB.Common.Settings.ParameterData
files.Summary: Represents a parameter with a name, display name, and selection state.

files.Title: MB.Common.SharedParameters.ElementExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for working with Revit <xref href="Element" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> objects.

files.Title: MB.Common.SharedParameters.SharedParameterExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for the <xref href="MB.Common.SharedParameters.ToolsSharedParameter" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> class.

files.Title: MB.Common.SharedParameters.SharedParameterType
files.Summary: Represents the types of shared parameters that can be used in Revit.

files.Title: MB.Common.SharedParameters.ToolsSharedParameter
files.Summary:
Defines shared parameters for use within Revit, including metadata such as GUIDs,
descriptions, parameter types, and applicable categories.

files.Title: MB.Common.Tools.MbfTool
files.Summary:
Enum representing various tools in the MBF (MicroBIM Fire) suite.
Each tool is decorated with descriptive metadata and optional shared parameter requirements.

files.Title: MB.Common.Tools.MbfToolExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for the <xref href="MB.Common.Tools.MbfTool" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> class.

files.Title: MB.Common.Utils.Attributes.AttributeUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for working with custom attributes in .NET.

files.Title: MB.Common.Utils.Handlers.MbHandlers
files.Summary: Provides static access to Revit external event handlers used across the application.

files.Title: MB.Common.Utils.Image.ImageUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility functions for working with images, such as resizing with high-quality settings.

files.Title: MB.Common.Utils.Loaders.MbResourceLoader
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for working with embedded resources, including loading JSON content and extracting files.

files.Title: MB.Common.Utils.Result.MbResult<T>
files.Summary: Represents the result of an operation, encapsulating the success status, value, and error message.

files.Title: MB.Common.ViewLoader.IsolatedViewLoader
files.Summary:
Provides extension methods for loading XAML views manually and in isolation from a URI.
This is used as a workaround for known issues in some WPF/Revit XAML loading contexts.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Creation.Extensions.DocumentExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for working with Revit documents, specifically for managing linked Revit models.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Extensions.DocumentExtensions
files.Summary:
Provides extension methods for working with Revit documents, enabling operations such as retrieving elements,
creating views, and managing linked documents.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Extensions.PipeExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for working with <xref href="Autodesk.Revit.DB.Plumbing.Pipe" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> objects in Revit.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Extensions.SelectionExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for retrieving selected elements of specific types from a <xref href="UIDocument" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Extensions.SpaceExtensions
files.Summary:
Provides extension methods for working with <xref href="Autodesk.Revit.DB.Mechanical.Space" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> objects,  including retrieving boundary segments and
validating the space.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Extensions.ViewExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for working with Revit views.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Models.MbDocument
files.Summary: Represents a Revit document, including both standalone documents and linked documents.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.SelectionFilters.DynamicCategorySelectionFilter
files.Summary: Represents a selection filter that dynamically allows elements based on their categories.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.SelectionFilters.FaceSelectionFilter
files.Summary:
Provides a selection filter for Revit elements and references, allowing selection of elements based on their
category and ensuring that references correspond to geometric faces.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.SelectionFilters.HostOrLinkedCategorySelectionFilter
files.Summary:
A selection filter that allows selecting elements from the host or a linked Revit model,
restricted to a specific set of categories.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.SelectionFilters.LinkedCategorySelectionFilter
files.Summary:
Selection filter for linked Revit documents that restricts selection to elements
belonging to specified categories within a selected <xref href="MBF.Revit.Data.SelectionFilters.LinkedCategorySelectionFilter.RevitLinkInstance" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Utils.EntityUtils
files.Summary:
Provides utility methods for working with entities and their associated fields, enabling the retrieval and
assignment of values such as <xref href="Autodesk.Revit.DB.XYZ" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> and <xref href="ElementId" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Utils.MbFlexPipesUtils
files.Summary: Filters the provided collection of Revit elements and retrieves all flex pipes.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Utils.MbParameterUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for working with Revit parameters.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Utils.MbPipeAccessoriesUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for working with pipe accessory elements in Revit.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Utils.MbPipeFittingsUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for working with pipe fittings in Revit.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Utils.MbPipesUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for working with pipe elements in Revit.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Utils.MbSpaceUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for working with <xref href="Autodesk.Revit.DB.Mechanical.Space" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> elements in Autodesk Revit.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Utils.MbSprinklersUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for working with sprinkler elements in Revit.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Utils.MbUnitUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for working with measurement units in Revit.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Utils.MbViewUtils
files.Summary:
Provides utility methods for working with Revit views, including graphical view checks, zooming to elements,
creating temporary 3D views, and managing view isolation.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Utils.PipePointType
files.Summary: Reprepipents a specific point along a pipe, either at the start or the end.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Utils.RevitUnitUtils
files.Summary: Determines whether the units of the specified Revit document are metric.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Data.Utils.XyzExtensibleStorage
files.Summary:
Provides utilities for reading and writing <xref href="Autodesk.Revit.DB.XYZ" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> start point data
for <xref href="Autodesk.Revit.DB.Plumbing.Pipe" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> elements using Revit's Extensible Storage API.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Extensions.BoundingBoxExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for working with <xref href="Autodesk.Revit.DB.BoundingBoxXYZ" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> objects.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Extensions.BoundingBoxVisualizerExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for visualizing bounding boxes as 2D outlines in a Revit document.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Extensions.ClipperExtensions
files.Summary:
Provides extension methods for working with <xref href="Clipper2Lib.PathsD" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> and <xref href="Clipper2Lib.PathD" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> collections, as well as
converting <xref href="Clipper2Lib.PathD" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> objects to Revit <xref href="CurveLoop" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> instances.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Extensions.CurveLoopExtensions
files.Summary:
Provides extension methods for converting <xref href="CurveLoop" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> objects into Clipper-compatible path
representations, such as <xref href="Clipper2Lib.PathD" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> and <xref href="Clipper2Lib.PathsD" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Extensions.CurveLoopVisualizerExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for visualizing and creating Revit elements from <xref href="CurveLoop" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> objects.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Extensions.CurveVisualizerExtensions
files.Summary:
Provides extension methods for visualizing <xref href="Autodesk.Revit.DB.Curve" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> instances as 2D geometry in Revit,
either using <xref href="DirectShape" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> elements in model views or <xref href="Autodesk.Revit.DB.DetailCurve" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> elements in drafting
views.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Extensions.DirectShapeVisualization
files.Summary: Provides methods for creating and managing <xref href="DirectShape" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> elements in a Revit document.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Extensions.PathDVisualizerExtensions
files.Summary:
Provides extension methods for visualizing <xref href="Clipper2Lib.PathD" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> and <xref href="Clipper2Lib.PathsD" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> objects as 2D outlines in
a
Revit document using <xref href="DirectShape" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> elements.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Extensions.XyzVisualizationsExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for visualizing <xref href="Autodesk.Revit.DB.XYZ" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> points as 3D objects in a Revit document.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Utils.MbXyzUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for working with 2D geometry, including operations on polygons and line segments.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Utils.PolygonUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for working with 2D polygons in the XY plane.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Voronoi.Models.Edge
files.Summary: Represents an edge in the Voronoi diagram, defined by a line equation and associated sites.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Voronoi.Models.GraphEdge
files.Summary:
Represents a graphical edge in the Voronoi diagram, defined by two endpoints and the indices of the two sites it
separates.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Voronoi.Models.Halfedge
files.Summary:
Represents a half-edge in the Voronoi diagram, used primarily in Fortune's algorithm for managing the beach line
and event queue.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Voronoi.Models.Point
files.Summary: Represents a point in 2D space.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Voronoi.Models.Site
files.Summary:
Represents a site (or generator point) used in the Voronoi diagram, typically associated with a cell in the
diagram.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Voronoi.Models.SiteSorterYX
files.Summary:
Provides a comparison mechanism for sorting <xref href="MBF.Revit.Geometry.Voronoi.Models.Site" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> instances.
Sorts first by Y-coordinate, then by X-coordinate if Y values are equal.
Useful for processing sites in Fortune's algorithm.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Voronoi.Models.Voronoi
files.Summary: Represents a Voronoi diagram generator.

files.Title: MBF.Revit.Geometry.Voronoi.Utils.MbVoronoiAlgorithmHelpers
files.Summary: Provides helper methods for generating Voronoi diagrams within a specified polygonal boundary.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.AttachedProperties.ComboBoxSearchBehavior
files.Summary:
Provides an attached behavior to enable search functionality in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>,
allowing live filtering of items based on user input.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.AttachedProperties.HelpAssistant
files.Summary:
Provides attached properties to define step-based help or onboarding instructions for UI elements.
Elements can be dynamically registered and retrieved in a specific order based on their step number.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.AttachedProperties.LocalizationHelper
files.Summary:
Provides localization support for WPF controls using attached properties.
When <xref href="MBFWpfToolkit.AttachedProperties.LocalizationHelper.LangKeyProperty" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> is set on a control, the corresponding localized value will be applied
automatically.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.AttachedProperties.ThemeBehavior
files.Summary: Provides attached properties and behaviors for managing themes in a WPF application.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.AttachedProperties.ThemeUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility methods for handling theme-related operations on WPF <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> instances.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Constants.MbMessageIcon
files.Summary:
Defines icons that can be displayed in a custom message box.
These icons represent different statuses or types of feedback for the user.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Constants.SkinType
files.Summary: Defines available theme skins for the application UI.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Controls.Help.HelpWizard
files.Summary: Represents an interactive in-app help wizard that guides users through UI elements step-by-step.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Controls.MbMessageBox
files.Summary: A custom message box window that supports MicroBIM.UI theming, icon display, and multiple button configurations.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Controls.MicroBimSprite
files.Summary: Represents the MicroBIM Sprite window used for displaying custom interactive UI elements.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Converters.Boolean2StringConverter
files.Summary: Converts a <xref href="System.Boolean" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> value to a <xref href="System.String" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> based on a semicolon-delimited parameter string.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Converters.BooleanErrorGroupToEnabledConverter
files.Summary: A multi-value converter that checks a list of boolean values (typically HasError flags). If any value is true, it returns false to disable a control (e.g., a button).

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Converters.BooleanToVisibilityWithInverseConverter
files.Summary:
Converts a <xref href="System.Boolean" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> value to a <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> value.
Supports optional inversion using a converter parameter.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Converters.EnumDisplayNameConverter
files.Summary:
A value converter for converting between enum values and their display names specified by the
<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Converters.NullToBooleanConverter
files.Summary: Converts a value to <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> based on whether it is null.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Converters.NullToVisibilityConverter
files.Summary: Converts a value to <xref href="System.Windows.Visibility" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> based on whether it is null.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Converters.NullToVisibilityWithInverseConverter
files.Summary: Converts a null value to a value. Supports optional inversion using a converter parameter.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Converters.ValidationMultiConverter
files.Summary:
A multi-value converter that validates a group of input values (typically bound from multiple
<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> elements).
It checks for empty input and validation errors to determine whether a button (or any control) should be enabled.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Extensions.CollectionExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for working with collections.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Extensions.ListExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.List%601" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> to support additional operations.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Extensions.ToleranceGroup<TKey, TElement>
files.Summary:
Represents a collection of elements that share a common key, with additional functionality for grouping and list
operations.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Helpers.MbNotification
files.Summary: Provides utility methods to display styled notifications using MicroBIM.UI's <xref href="MicroBIM.UI.Controls.Growl" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> system.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Helpers.MbResourceHelper
files.Summary: Provides helper methods for retrieving theme and skin resources in a WPF application.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Helpers.PasswordHelper
files.Summary:
Provides attached properties and helper methods to enable binding for the Password property of PasswordBox
controls.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Helpers.WindowController
files.Summary:
Manages the lifecycle of modeless WPF windows to prevent duplicates,
maintain a global reference list, and enable programmatic control.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.MbViewModel.MbBaseViewModel
files.Summary:
Represents the base ViewModel class inheriting from ObservableValidator.
Provides a common set of functionalities for ViewModels, including validation capabilities.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.MbWindow
files.Summary:
Represents a customizable WPF window with extended properties and features,
including theming, language selection, and plugin-related configurations.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Models.HelpStep
files.Summary: Represents a help step in the UI help wizard with an associated UI element, descriptive text, and order.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Properties.Langs.Lang
files.Summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Properties.Langs.Lang_en
files.Summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.Utils.WindowUtils
files.Summary: Provides utility functions for managing windows and processes in a WPF application.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.ValidationRules.DecimalValidationRule
files.Summary: Validation rule for decimal input with localization support.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.ValidationRules.DoubleValidationRule
files.Summary: Validation rule for double input with localization support.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.ValidationRules.IntegerValidationRule
files.Summary: Validation rule for integer input with localization support.

files.Title: MBFWpfToolkit.ValidationRules.StringValidationRule
files.Summary: Validation rule for string input with localization support.

files.Title: Revit.Extensions.Elements.PipeExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for Pipe elements in Revit.

files.Title: Revit.Extensions.Elements.SpaceExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for Space elements in Revit.

files.Title: Revit.Extensions.Extensions.CollectionExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for working with collections.

files.Title: Revit.Extensions.Extensions.DocumentExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for the Autodesk Revit API with the result pattern for better error handling.

files.Title: Revit.Extensions.Extensions.PipeExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for Pipe elements in Revit.

files.Title: Revit.Extensions.Extensions.SpaceExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for Space elements in Revit.

files.Title: Revit.Extensions.Extensions.ViewExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for Revit views.

files.Title: Revit.Extensions.Selections.SelectionExtensions
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for retrieving selected elements of specific types from a <xref href="UIDocument" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Revit.Extensions.Unit.MbUnitExtensions
files.Summary:
Provides utility methods and properties for working with Revit units,
including conversion to and from internal units and determining document unit type.
